Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Provides for the appeal of disputes between shareholders and boards of directors of residential cooperative corporations to a hearing officer appointed by the attorney general
Summary: Provides for the appeal of disputes between shareholders and boards of directors of residential cooperatives to a hearing officer appointed by the attorney general.
LawCode: Add ยง78, Coop Corps L; amd ยง63, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cooperative corporations law and the executive law, in relation to providing for the resolution of disputes between the board of directors of residential cooperative corporations and a shareholder to be determined by a hearing officer appointed by the attorney general
